flawed_nl_solution:
50cm³ will make one balloon touch the ceiling so 1800cm³ will make 1800/50 = <<1800/50=36.0>>36.0 balloons touch the ceiling
There are 50 balloons in total so 50-36.0 = <<50-36.0=13.0>>13.0 balloons will not float since they were filled with ordinary air
There are 36.0-13.0 = <<36.0-13.0=23.0>>23.0 more balloons touching the ceiling than not

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 14.0, not 13.0. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
